body_html: I don't think that's a good idea. If you know it can happen in your use case just filter out the empty sequences before you call this function. It would make it more convenient for you, but may silently accept inputs that are incorrect for other uses.

body: I don't think that's a good idea. If you know it can happen in your use case just filter out the empty sequences before you call this function. It would make it more convenient for you, but may silently accept inputs that are incorrect for other uses.
